org.relationlearn.filters

Class SequentialFilterGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.relationlearn.filters.SequentialFilterGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FilterGroup

    public class SequentialFilterGroup
extends Object
implements FilterGroup
    Implementation of FilterGroup which applies the TextFilter objects to the input in the same order they were added to group and in a sequential manner.
    See Also:
    FilterGroup, TextFilter

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SequentialFilterGroup()
      Constructs a SequentialFilterGroup with the dataset name "test-dataset".
      SequentialFilterGroup(String dataset)
      Constructs a SequentialFilterGroup with the dataset name dataset.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFilter(TextFilter filter)
      Adds a new TextFilter to the FilterGroup.
      Instance createInstanceUsingFilters(String r, String h)
      Generates an Instance object by applying all the TextFilter elements contained in the FilterGroup to the input parameters provided.
      FastVector getGroupAttributes()
      Returns a FastVector instance containing all the Attribute elements of this FilterGroup, this Attribute elements are the one's each Instace generated with the method createInstanceUsingFilters must have.
      String getGroupDatasetName()
      Returns the dataset name for this FilterGroup.
